text: My name is Max Peterson.

I'm the Vice President
of Sovereign Cloud at AWS.

I work with customers
around the world to help them

meet the most stringent
security requirements,

sovereignty requirements,
and privacy requirements.

We want to make sure
that our customers can use

the AWS cloud
without constraints.

Customers need more options
to be able to meet

the unique needs of digital
sovereignty around the world.

AWS simply gives customers
more choice across our

AWS Regions around the world
that are sovereign-by-design

to our AWS infrastructure
solutions for sovereignty

all the way through to the
AWS European Sovereign Cloud.

Customers shouldn't have
to compromise.

One of the most important things
that we talk to

customers about is how to achieve
digital sovereignty

that's relevant to their country
and their circumstance.

At AWS, we do it
with a combination of

technical measures,
operational controls,
and legal protections.

Security is foundational
to sovereignty

and so our goal is to continue
to evolve our sovereign
by design features

so that customers have
more control and more choice.
